json_schema_specifications.description:
Parameters to be used with the following quantities:
`cycling_channel` - `service`

number_required_channels.description: The number of cycling channels required for the cycling experiment.
number_required_channels.title: Number Required Channels

cycling_protocol.description: The designation of the protocol to use for the cycling experiment.
cycling_protocol.title: Cycling Protocol

number_cycles.description: The number of cycles, which are planned for the cycling experiment.
number_cycles.title: Number Cycles

json_schema_specifications.title: CyclingChannelInput

json_schema_result_output.description:
Results returned from the following quantities:
'capacity' - 'cycling'

success.description: Indicator for the success of the reservation. This is False, if the number of available channels is not sufficient to satisfy the request.
success.title: Success

reservation_id.description: An ID associated with the reservation to identify the request once the request for the cycling experiment is received. This ID needs to be provided by the requester in the input for the cycling experiment (associated with the quantity 'capacity').This ID is only provided, if the requested number of channels was reserved.
reservation_id.title: Reservation Id

json_schema_result_output.title: CyclingChannelOutput
